I've managed to get past the auto-update.  Copy the settings.ini file (found in the updater folder) to your desktop.  Edit it and change version to 2.4.2.1 and then save.  Copy the desktop file back in the updater folder.

To get by the auto-updater, go to the the program's install location (usually C:program filestuneupmedia), then go in the updater folder and edit the settings.ini file.

Change the version to the latest and it won't attempt to update.
